hero.title: We craft websites that convert.
hero.subtitle: Premium digital agency specializing in high-performance, elegant, and results-driven web design.

services.title: Tailored digital solutions
services.subtitle: Every project is unique. We combine design, technology, and strategy to create exceptional digital experiences.

design.title: UI/UX Design
design.description: Elegant and intuitive interfaces designed to maximize user engagement and conversion.

development.title: Web Development
development.description: High-performance sites built with cutting-edge technologies. Fast, secure, and scalable.

seo.title: SEO & Performance
seo.description: Advanced search engine optimization and ultra-fast loading times for maximum visibility.

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce
ecommerce.description: Premium online stores with optimized purchase journeys to maximize your sales.

portfolio.title: Our work
portfolio.subtitle: Explore a selection of projects that showcase our expertise and commitment to quality.

dkrEat.title: Dakar Eat
dkrEat.description: Complete platform for a Senegalese restaurant: showcase site, online ordering, admin dashboard with client tracking, influencer management and real-time commissions.
dkrEat.heroSubtitle: A complete digital tool for authentic Senegalese dining

website.title: The Website
website.description: A modern and warm showcase site highlighting authentic Senegalese cuisine. Intuitive navigation, interactive menu with online ordering, and responsive design optimized for conversion.

dashboard.title: The Admin Dashboard
dashboard.description: A comprehensive dashboard enabling the restaurant owner to manage orders, products, influencer partnerships and commissions in real time. Detailed client tracking and performance analytics.

results.title: Results
results.description: An all-in-one digital solution that transformed the restaurant's management and boosted its online visibility.

nisware.title: Nisware
nisware.description: Proximity-based social network: 24h ephemeral content, live events, alerts and deals shared by people around you. Responsive landing page + Android application.
nisware.heroSubtitle: The real-world social network — see what's happening around you in real time

landing.title: The Landing Page
landing.description: A clean and modern landing page presenting the Nisware concept. Responsive design optimized for desktop, tablet and mobile with direct APK download.

concept.title: The Concept
concept.description: Social networks connect us to the whole world, but none connect us to what's happening around us. Nisware solves this with local, ephemeral content shared by nearby people.

results.title: Features
results.description: Markets & meetups, concerts & events, promos & deals, alerts & incidents, neighborhood life, local tourism — all visible for 24h within a 3km radius.

duo2mc.title: Duo2MC
duo2mc.description: Complete website for a Master of Ceremonies & DJ duo: premium showcase, booking system, online payment, marketing funnel and 21 optimized pages.
duo2mc.heroSubtitle: Two voices. One vision. An experience that leaves its mark.

website.title: The Showcase Website
website.description: A dark & gold premium website presenting wedding and corporate services. Smooth navigation, dedicated pages for weddings, corporate events, pricing plans and client testimonials.

booking.title: The Booking System
booking.description: A complete booking journey with Calendly scheduling, inquiry form, secure payment system and automatic confirmation.

results.title: Results
results.description: A complete digital ecosystem with conversion funnel, webinar, client onboarding and offer management — turning every visit into a booking.

process.title: A proven process
process.subtitle: From idea to launch, every step is designed to deliver results that match your ambitions.

discovery.title: Discovery
discovery.description: We analyze your needs, market, and goals to define a clear digital strategy.

design.title: Design
design.description: Custom mockups that reflect your identity and optimize the user experience.

development.title: Development
development.description: Pixel-perfect integration with top-tier technologies and industry best practices.

testing.title: Testing & QA
testing.description: Rigorous testing across all browsers and devices to ensure a flawless experience.

launch.title: Launch
launch.description: Go-live, training, and support to ensure the success of your digital project.

about.title: Digital excellence, our signature.
about.description: AgaiGency was born from the belief that a website can be both a design masterpiece and a powerful growth tool. We push the boundaries of the web to create experiences that leave lasting impressions.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Every pixel matters, every detail is crafted

results.title: Results
results.description: Sites that perform and generate ROI
